statements: DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_consumed >= 100 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE location='New York' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_providers WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM energy_providers WHERE provider_name = 'ACME Energy' AND location = 'California';
DELETE FROM energy_sources WHERE source_name = 'Solar Panels' AND energy_type = 'Renewable';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE Date = '2022-01-15' AND Time = '12:30:00';
DELETE FROM EnergyPredictions WHERE Date='2022-08-10' AND Time='12:00:00';
